nodes.text: Borish was a spoken language that was used in the galaxy. In 4 ABY, Borish was spoken by a tentacled individual in the dungeon of Jabba's Palace on Tatooine.

Borish first appeared in the 1983 film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was first identified in the Star Wars By the Numbers video "Every Language in Star Wars Movies," which was posted on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel in 2019.
